name: Corner Cupboard (Encoignure)
maker: Carcass and mounts attributed to Jean-Pierre Latz, and marquetry panels attributed to Jean-François Oeben
description: Corner Cupboard (Encoignure); Carcass and mounts attributed to Jean-Pierre Latz (French, about 1691 - 1754), and marquetry panels attributed to Jean-François Oeben (French, born Germany, 1721 - 1763, master 1761); Paris, France; about 1750 - 1755; Oak veneered with amaranth, maple, stained maple, and walnut; gilt-bronze mounts; brèche d'Alep marble top; 92.1 x 81.9 x 61 cm (36 1/4 x 32 1/4 x 24 in.); 72.DA.69.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Corner Cupboard (Encoignure)
medium: Oak veneered with amaranth, maple, stained maple, and walnut; gilt-bronze mounts; brèche d'Alep marble top
